brandTheme.description:
Theme variant for branded elements like the footer.
- 'default': Standard Soyio brand colors (purple/indigo)
- 'dark': Dark mode with gray tones
- 'light': Mono color light version

consentControl.description:
Control type for consent items.
- 'switch': Toggle switch (default)
- 'checkbox': Checkbox

consentManagementColumns.description: Number of columns in the consent management grid.

hintIcon.description: Icon name to use for hint/help tooltips on input labels. Available icons: 'Question' (default), 'Info', 'QuestionMark', etc.

icon.description: Global icon appearance configuration. Controls default weight and size for all icons.

iconRules.description: Per-component icon overrides. Allows customizing icon styles for specific components.

mainPageColumns.description: Number of columns in the main page feature cards grid.

dataUseVariant.description: Override variant for data use icons in consent management. If not set, uses the company's configured iconVariant.

weight.description:
Icon weight/style variant.
- thin: Thinnest stroke
- light: Light stroke
- regular: Default stroke (default)
- bold: Bold stroke
- fill: Filled/solid icons
- duotone: Two-tone icons with opacity
